name: Mini Traffic Driving
description:
Mini Traffic Driving is amazing multimode traffic driving 3D for racing game lovers.

Beautiful levels in say and Night mode for highway racing , Arena racing mode and free style driving skills test mode.

Super cool mini cars , truck , tanks ,jeeps and police cars for top class entertainment, you can also pic tanks if you love tank driving simulation ,out of the box physics based simulation , Sit on driving seat and drive on infinite race track collect coins and unlock your best vehicles.

Amazing heavy vehicles like grabage truck is also available for you.

Don't forget to fill your vehicles fuel tanks with gas for long journey.

Have fun with mini blocky vehicles.
